# Dragon's Breath (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Acid Spells|acid]], [[Cold Spells|cold]], [[Electricity Spells|electricity]], or [[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S, M (a dragon scale)

**Range:** 30 ft. or 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst or line

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 217

You breathe out a blast of energy. Creatures in the affected area take 1d6 points of energy damage per caster level (maximum of 12d6). A successful Reflex save results in half damage. The spellâ€™s effect and energy type depend on the type of dragon scale used:

*Black dragon:* 60-foot line of acid.

*Blue or bronze dragon:* 60-foot line of electricity.

*Green dragon:* 30-foot cone of acid.

*Gold or red dragon:* 30-foot cone of fire.

*Silver or white dragon:* 30-foot cone of cold.

*Brass dragon:* 60-foot line of fire.

*Copper dragon:* 60-foot line of acid.
